entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. Your call is very important to us. Please hold while we connect you to the next available agent.
Thank you for calling VeloFit, my name is Sarah, how can I help you today?
Yes, hello. I'm calling about a return. I bought a VeloBand Pulse a little over two weeks ago, and I want to send it back. It’s just not what I expected.
I understand. Let me pull up your order. Can I get your order number or the email address associated with the purchase?
It's jane.doe@email.com. Hurry up, I don’t have all day.
Thank you, Ms. Doe. I see the VeloBand Pulse purchase here. I understand you'd like to initiate a return. Can you tell me what the issue is?
Like I said, it's not what I expected. The heart rate monitoring is wonky, and honestly, it’s just a pain to use. It's just not as good as the smart watch my friend has.

I'm sorry to hear you're not satisfied with the VeloBand Pulse. Our goal is for you to love our products. Regarding the return, we do have a return policy in place. Let me check on the details for you based on the purchase date. Generally, we have a 90 days window for returns.
90 days? Great! I was worried it would be a hassle. So, what do I need to do?

Okay, I've confirmed the purchase date. Because you are within that 90 days window, I can definitely help you with the return. I will go ahead and generate a prepaid shipping label for you. You’ll receive an email within the next hour with the label and instructions on how to pack and ship the VeloBand Pulse back to us.
Excellent! That's exactly what I wanted to hear. When can I expect my refund?

Once we receive the VeloBand Pulse at our warehouse, your refund will be processed within 7-10 business days and credited back to your original payment method. You'll receive an email notification once the refund has been processed. Let me just reiterate the return policy here - you're well within the 90 days, so no problem on my end. I want to be sure you understand, though, that some products, like accessories, have a more limited return timeframe, but this VeloBand Pulse qualifies for the standard policy.
Perfect. You’ve been a great help. Thank you so much!
You're very welcome, Ms. Doe. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
You're welcome! Thank you for choosing VeloFit. Have a wonderful day!
